Room.Name: Diamond and Gold Balcony
Room.ShortDescription: You are hovering near a glittering balcony overlooking the main entry.
Room.LongDescription: You are suspended high over the entry floor of the Wizard's Eye, the world-famous training facility for young mages through level nine. If you aspire to level ten and above, there are some older members of the order whom you must meet, that they may pass judgment on you. Go through the arches and learn what you must.
